name: spv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Specialization, using implicit substitution. See ~ spvv for a version using fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)
